meanings.definition: A person who writes their own life story.
meanings.sent1: Many famous autobiographers share their personal journeys through books.
meanings.sent2: Autobiographers often reflect on their past to create compelling narratives.
meanings.sent3: The group of autobiographers at the library event had a lively discussion about their writing process.
meanings.sent4: She compared the autobiographers to painters, each using their unique brushstrokes to tell a story.
meanings.sent5: The autobiographers' tales were like colorful threads weaving together a rich tapestry of life stories.

meanings.definition: Those who document their own experiences and memories.
meanings.sent1: The autobiographers in the workshop shared tips on preserving memories through writing.
meanings.sent2: Autobiographers capture moments in time through their personal accounts.
meanings.sent3: The group of autobiographers exchanged journals to see different perspectives on shared experiences.
meanings.sent4: Their words were like mirrors reflecting the diverse reflections of the autobiographers.
meanings.sent5: The autobiographers' notebooks were filled with snapshots of their lives, like a photo album in words.
